overrides.synopsis: Ease your way into modded, with extensive documentation.

changelogs.1-1-0:
1.1.0 UPDATE

Mods Updated:
* ActuallyAdditions-1.12.2-r150.jar
* Botania r1.10-362.jar
* BuildingGadgets-2.7.3.jar
* CodeChickenLib-1.12.2-3.2.3.358-universal.jar
* DocumentYourModMod-1.2.0.jar
* ElevatorMod-1.12.2-1.3.12.jar
* Forgelin-1.8.4.jar
* FTBAcademyMod-1.0.3.59.jar
* FTBBanners-1.1.0.12.jar
* FTBGuides-2.0.0.50.jar
* FTBLib-5.4.3.138.jar
* FTBQuests-1.7.2.218.jar #31
* FTBTutorialMod-1.0.0.11.jar
* FTBUtilities-5.4.0.106.jar
* Instrumental-Mobs-1.2.jar #12
* jei_1.12.2-4.15.0.289.jar
* minetogether-1.10.2-2.2.0-RC6.jar
* ProjectIntelligence-1.12.2-1.0.8.25-universal.jar
* randompatches-1.12.2-1.18.1.1.jar
* RebornCore-1.12.2-3.16.0.473-universal.jar
* Rex's-Additional-Structures-1.12.2-(v.2.2.3).jar
* SmoothFont-mc1.12.2-2.1.1.jar
* StorageDrawers-1.12.2-5.4.0.jar

Mods Added:
* jetif-1.12.2-1.5.1.jar #2
* KubeJS-forge-1.12.2-1.0.0.45.jar
* VanillaFix-1.0.10-99.jar #39

Mods Removed:

Changes:
* Disabled Dynamic Trees world gen. MOD WILL BE REMOVED IN FUTURE UPDATE -aaronhowser1, Sunekaer, LatvianModder
* Reworked a lot of the school -aaronhowser1, Sunekaer, LatvianModder
* Changed quest tutorial a bit -aaronhowser1
* Changed first images of tutorials to reduce confusion #17 -aaronhowser1
* Added "Tutorial:" to the beginning of tutorial names -aaronhowser1
* Renamed Slimesling tasks #23 -aaronhowser1
* Draconic Chest quest now requires DE Infusion quest #10 -aaronhowser1
* Fixed Basic Tesslocator quests aren't hidden by default #1 -Sunekaer
* Fixed it saying "My Quests" instead of "My Team" on first page of guide #3 -Sunekaer
* Changed Extradimensional and Water-Safe quests to ignore damage false #25 -Sunekaer
* Fixed misspell in Specialization Augments quest #29 -Sunekaer
* Added Congealed Blood items to Slimesling quest #33 -aaronhowser1
* Unhid Cave Illuminator quest, so the whole 3x3 block of quests are showing when that tier unlocks #50 -aaronhowser1
* Illumination Wand quest now requires Celestial Altar #51 -aaronhowser1
* Hid DE Energy Crystal quests until unlocked #51 -aaronhowser1
* Hid Tech - Expert quests until unlocked #56 -aaronhowser1
* Fixed Energy Tesslocator quest text #57 -aaronhowser1
* Disabled AA's update tracker #60 -aaronhowser1
* Nerfed Gold Bow reward to Multishot I instead of III #55 -aaronhowser
* Set tech quests to not need manuals #37 -aaronhowser1
* Tweaked DE rewards a bit -aaronhowser1
* Minimap shows caves #35 -aaronhowser1
* Mentioned in Lich quest that the Guide has the strategy for each boss in TF -aaronhowser1
* Added TE Reservoir to BackTools blacklist #38 -Sunekaer
* Changed Building Gadgets default key #71 -Sunekaer
* Disabled ActuallyAdditions "Version Specific Update Checker" -Sunekaer
* Changed Lens in "Starlight Redirection Lens" to NBT Ignore #70 -Sunekaer
* Swapped Ghostly light and Trecon quest placement #69 -Sunekaer
* Enabled localization for Astral Sorcery and Transportation quest chapter titles #92 -aaronhowser1
* Added some more Easter Eggs to the school -aaronhowser1
* Drill Augments moved to being rewards instead of a task -aaronhowser1
* Created quests for claiming and chunkloading chunks #104 -aaronhowser1
* Created quest for getting a Creeper to explode in a claimed chunk -aaronhowser1
* Technological Transmutation, Two for One Special, Factory Farming, The Crushinator, More of the Same, Old King Coal set to ignore NBT #96 -LatvianModder
* Wyvern Boots added to Penultimate Armor quest -LatvianModder
* Moved files in resources/assets directory to resources -LatvianModder
* Added advancement rewards to Twlight Forest quests, once one team member completes quest, others can now do next boss -LatvianModder
* Saving for Later, Virtute Reparavit, A Certain Scientific Infusion Altar, Player Interface set to ignore NBT -LatvianModder
* Disabled iChunUtil version check -LatvianModder
* Disabled inventory lists from Tomb Many Graves -Sunekaer
* Changed TiCon quest text to explain why you'd use the mod -aaronhowser1
* Disabled "Lush Caves" from Actually Additions -Sunekaer
* Moved Draconium Chest quest to Tech - Advanced -aaronhowser1
* Disabled foxhounds -Sunekaer
* Made tutorials more brief -aaronhowser1
* Greenhouse Glass quest no longer mentions that it stacks, as this was removed #126 -aaronhowser1
* Changed barrier to have a texture instead of particles -LatvianModder
